entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
